scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../the-roster-radar-frontend && npm i
scripts.script:server: cd server && npm run build && npm run init && npm run populate
scripts.build: npm run script:server && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd the-roster-radar-frontend && npm start"
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server" "cd the-roster-radar-frontend && npm run dev"
